item.title: HElp! if ur good in smf forums!
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Admin Control Panel>Features and Options>Karma> enable it from there.

EDIT: Why did you bump this from so long ago?
